channel.title: TechwithLC AI News
channel.description: Latest AI news curated and summarized by TechwithLC

item.title: AI will soon be taking your drive-thru orders at 500 Taco Bell, Pizza Hut, KFC locations
item.description: Fast-food giant Yum! Brands said it will begin rolling out AI at hundreds of its locations starting in April. How has AI worked at other fast-food chains?

item.title: Radical new tech brings flying cars closer to reality
item.description: With six cyclorotors, the BlackBird from CycloTech is designed to take off and land vertically, move sideways, brake mid-air and even parallel park.

item.title: The Effects of Artificial Intelligence
item.description: The rise of artificial intelligence unlocks an altered world of possibilities that are already transforming how humans work, learn, heal, grieve, relate, and worship.

item.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang joked about something that could cost his biggest customers billions of dollars
item.description: Huang's joke at Nvidia's big AI conference this week highlights potential billion-dollar impacts on tech giants like Microsoft, Google, and Meta.

item.title: The Social Security Administration's many proposed changes are worrying advocates
item.description: The Trump administration has announced a flurry of changes at the agency that oversees Social Security. Advocates warn these moves could lead to people having a harder time getting help with benefits.
